passage.title: Mommy ill
passage.paragraph: Mary is an operator of 911 in Los Angeles. One Thursday morning, she is surprised to get a call from a young child. The child says, "Mommy ill. Mommy ill." again and again.

Mary hurries to find the address of the call. She calls the policemen. In a few minutes, the policemen and doctors arrive at the house. They break the door open. They can't believe their eyes. The little child is so yound that maybe she can not walk! She is sitting beside her mother and holding her mother's hand. Tears are running down her face.
